sent.orig: The relation between crop water use efficiency and crop productivity potential, crop yield were investigated.
sent.trans: 研究了作物水分利用效率与作物生产潜力、产量的关系。

sent.orig: Perennial crop: Crop, which remains on the field more than one year.
sent.trans: 多年生作物：在地块上生长一年以上的作物。

sent.orig: Crop, add so little animal power makes crop is had pity on less It'seems that.
sent.trans: 农作物，加上那么一点点畜力使产量看起来少得可怜。

sent.orig: When the summer crop is ripening, the autumn crop has to be sowed.
sent.trans: 夏季作物成熟时，就得播种秋季作物。

sent.orig: If you click on the crop circle icon, it brings up a search for crop circles.
sent.trans: 如果你点击麦田怪圈的标识，它会将你带到到麦田怪圈的搜索页面。
